---
title: "Darksharp"
description: "All-black theme with sharp corners"
icon: "palette"
---

# Darksharp Theme

An all-black theme with `rounded-none` styling â€” clean, minimal, and sharp.

## Usage

```tsx title="docs.config.tsx"
import { defineDocs } from "@farming-labs/docs";
import { darksharp } from "@farming-labs/fumadocs/darksharp";

export default defineDocs({
  entry: "docs",
  theme: darksharp(),
});
```

```css title="app/global.css"
@import "tailwindcss";
@import "@farming-labs/fumadocs/darksharp/css";
```

## Defaults

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| Primary | Near-white |
| Background | `#000000` (pure black) |
| Border radius | `0px` (no rounding) |
| Content width | 860px |
| Sidebar width | 286px |

## Customizing

```tsx
theme: darksharp({
  ui: {
    colors: { primary: "oklch(0.65 0.25 270)" },
  },
}),
```
